name: Deep Cleaning
description: A comprehensive and thorough cleaning of your space, reaching the deep grime and dirt in your home or office.

name: Move In/Out Cleaning
description: Specialized cleaning service designed for people who are moving in or out of a property to ensure a spotless space.

name: Post Renovation Cleaning
description: Cleaning after construction or renovation work, including removal of dust, debris, and leftover materials.

name: Standard Cleaning
description: Routine cleaning to maintain cleanliness and tidiness in your home or workspace.

name: Office Cleaning
description: Cleaning service tailored for office environments, including desk areas, meeting rooms, and communal spaces.

name: Disinfection Service
description: Professional-grade disinfection to eliminate germs and bacteria, ideal for homes and businesses.

name: Upholstery Cleaning
description: Specialized cleaning for furniture fabrics such as sofas and chairs to remove stains and allergens.

name: Carpet Cleaning
description: Deep cleaning of carpets using professional equipment to remove stains, odors, and allergens.

name: Mattress Cleaning
description: Sanitization and deep cleaning of mattresses to ensure a hygienic sleeping environment.

name: Stair Cleaning
description: clean stairs.

name: Especially for Office
description: Office Cleaning

name: Residential
description: Spring cleaning special

name: Office
description: Service for ofice

name: Move-Out
description: move service

name: Standard
description: Service standard

name: Eco-Friendly
description: Service description 297

name: One-Time Cleaning
description: A single cleaning service for those who need a quick clean without a recurring schedule.

name: Recurring Cleaning
description: Regularly scheduled cleaning services, available weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly.

name: Green Cleaning
description: Environmentally friendly cleaning using non-toxic and biodegradable products.

name: Window Cleaning
description: Cleaning of windows, both interior and exterior, to ensure a streak-free shine.

name: Pressure Washing
description: High-pressure cleaning for outdoor surfaces like driveways, patios, and siding.

name: Tile and Grout Cleaning
description: Deep cleaning of tile surfaces and grout lines to remove stains and restore shine.

name: Oven Cleaning
description: Thorough cleaning of ovens, including the removal of grease and burnt-on food.

name: Fridge Cleaning
description: Cleaning and sanitizing of refrigerators, including removal of expired food and spills.

name: Laundry Service
description: Washing, drying, and folding of laundry items, available as a standalone service or in conjunction with cleaning.

name: Pet Odor Removal
description: Specialized cleaning to eliminate pet odors from carpets, upholstery, and other surfaces.

name: Emergency Cleaning
description: Rapid response cleaning service for unexpected situations like floods or fire damage.
